Comments.Message: Hmm... looks like we need to change some naming arround.
I am also seeing the same problem Error	1	'PollQuestion' is ambiguous, imported from the namespaces or types 'ClubStarterKit.Web, ClubStarterKit.Data'.	on a "fresh" n stall of the latest release

Actually, I got a Warning and an Error message:Warning	1	Variable 'd' is used before it has been assigned a value. A null reference exception could result at runtime.	C:\Documents and Settings\mxj1009\My Documents\Visual Studio 2005\WebSites\ClubStarterKitBeta\UserControls\ImageFetch.ashx	52Error	2	'PollQuestion' is ambiguous, imported from the namespaces or types 'ClubStarterKit.Web, ClubStarterKit.Data'. All you have to do to fix this is specify where "PollQuestion" should come from. I'm not quite sure where (off the top of my head) but this is a fairly easy fix.
